/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. Cars of various colors are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. In the distance, a large building looms, its architecture a testament to the city's architectural style. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees.
